name: ProvenProspects, Inc.
overview:
Follow the money with ProvenProspects! See the proven buying and financing behavior of the businesses in your territory.

ProvenProspects™ unique database can tell you the type of equipment prospects are using down to model and serial number, how old those productive assets are, and which ones will most likely be replaced. We take pride in being the only company to offer full analysis and search capabilities for collateral equipment descriptions found in UCC filings.

The Data-As-A-Service platform also shows which companies in your market have just received business financing, the companies that are cash-ready to buy your products and services now.

ABOUT PROVENPROSPECTS

Our mission is to maximize economic growth and market efficiency by organizing and analyzing America’s major business transactions.

Products: Our data tears down the walls that prevent companies from knowing the business prospects that matter most. In a world with ProvenProspects, businesses use the best technology at the best time and place. Instead of just surviving, businesses thrive, and businesses that are growing, grow even faster.

ProvenProspects™ provides B2B sales & marketing professionals with the largest collection of UCC equipment & finance buyer data, best utilized for B2B lead generation. The data provides sales & marketing lists of business prospects that have the highest propensity to need your products and services now.

Core Values: Our company is committed to the highest level of customer satisfaction. We strive to continually improve our platform and grow the number and quality of prospects we provide to our end users. We are driven by your needs, and in doing so; we uphold the following core values:

Integrity We will be honest about our product and communicate a fair solution to your team.

Innovation Research and development is at the core of our daily routine- we strive to continually deliver a cutting-edge solution.

Intelligence Our team is educated on our product and its uses and will be ready to help you best implement and utilize our unique system.

Insight We keep abreast of market trends and changes and adapt our organization to best serve you, the customer.

Information Our company is founded on information- it is most critical in today’s fast-paced business environment. We will be accurate- we understand you trust us with your leads and we hold that responsibility in the highest regard.

We are personally dedicated to upholding these core values across our entire organization. We founded this firm because we believe in providing the most valuable information to the people that need it most.

Which businesses will most likely become my next customers? ProvenProspects™ is the first company to map the entire UCC Filing Universe. Categorizing every major lender and equipment specific keyword contained in UCC-1 filings, for all 50 States. Select your industry to see customized marketing list sample data.
